text: Ghia Nodia (; born 1954 in Russia) is a Georgian political analyst who was the Minister of Education and Science of Georgia, from 31 January 2008 until 10 December 2008. == Other websites == * Ghia Nodia's article in the Financial Times Category:1954 births Category:Government ministers of Georgia (country) Category:Scientists from Georgia (country) Category:Political scientists Category:Living people
title: Ghia Nodia
